name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a series of malicious scripts on multiple hosts.

action--b1c62b40-eade-433f-9a5f-1bdb9563.name: Kill malicious script processes
action--b1c62b40-eade-433f-9a5f-1bdb9563.description: Terminate all instances of the malicious script identified on the network.

action--145c5de9-5e0c-4f65-babc-ec6a4420.name: Disable PowerShell execution policy
action--145c5de9-5e0c-4f65-babc-ec6a4420.description: Set the PowerShell execution policy to restricted.

parallel--2a39c92b-231d-4df0-a464-d62edd.name: Initiate malware scanning
parallel--2a39c92b-231d-4df0-a464-d62edd.description: Run malware scans on all hosts affected by the malicious scripts.

action--e643146d-3412-4e61-bbcb-7ff2cdf4.name: Scan all hosts for malware
action--e643146d-3412-4e61-bbcb-7ff2cdf4.description: Perform malware scans on all hosts until no malware is found.

while-condition--68da64a3-e7ff-4857-8d69.name: Repeat scanning until clean
while-condition--68da64a3-e7ff-4857-8d69.description: Continue scanning until no malicious files are detected.
